alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 12:50PM CDT until July 22 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Southern Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... Western Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 115 PM CDT. * At 1250 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Daleville to 8 miles west of Samson, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Daleville, Enterprise, Hartford, Level Plains, Samson, Clayhatchee, Kinston, Coffee Springs, Chancellor, Lytle, Lucile, Marl, Central City, Logan Field Municipal A/P, Cairns Aaf, Earlytown, Hacoda, Pera, Spears and Weeks. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
